summary.span: 描述一个服务，该服务可返回所分析标记的根对象。

span.span: Describes a service that can return the root object of markup being parsed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务是主要与由特定框架或框架中常用根元素类的功能公开的应用程序服务。The service is mainly relevant to application services that are exposed by a particular framework or by capabilities of a commonly-used root element class in a framework. 类型转换器和标记扩展可以查询作为 XAML 对象编写器调用值转换行为时，XAML 对象编写器提供的服务上下文上的服务。Type converters and markup extensions can query for as a service on the service context that is provided by a XAML object writer, when the XAML object writer invokes value conversion behavior. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md)并[Service Contexts Available to 类型转换器和标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md).

summary.span: 从标记中或从对象图中获取根对象。

span.span: Gets the root object from markup or from an object graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 标记方案中的根对象可能是由于可能会由约定设置 XAML 标记的根级别的特性用于标记扩展方案。The root object in a XAML markup scenario might be useful for markup extension scenarios because of attributes that might by convention be set at the root level of XAML markup. 可能由框架指定特定的根对象功能。Specific root object capabilities might be specified by frameworks. 例如，某些属性可能仅在有效的根级别或框架可能支持从根的全局属性的继承。For example, certain attributes might only be valid at the root level, or a framework might support inheritance of global properties from the root.
